description:
This an hp webOS based guide to accompany you on your visit to Paris, France.

It contains an OFFLINE database of points of interest including cafes,bars and museums in the city. This helps you avoid data roaming charges while traveling abroad.

GPS is used to assist in determining the distance and direction to the sights nearest to your current location.

Note that if there is anything you feel should be added, we would appreciate you emailing us.

Bon voyage!
John
versionNote:
This is now the same as the Plus version also available in the App Catalog.
If you like the application consider purchasing it to help in its upkeep.
